Zardus wasn't holding a rifle, he was looking at the one Punch was holding.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus nods. "Very well, Punch. Follo-" Zardus' sentence is interrupted as 
his comm-link comes to life.

"The base is under attack! Me and Perndabot are engaging the enemy!" 
DevilDuer's voice says in an excited voice.

Zardus nods. "Let's go. Follow me," he says and flies off towards the 
alliance base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer and Perndabot run out of the alliance base as the four shots hit 
the shields. They open fire along with the base defences.

Bloodystrike flies in, firing at the attackers from behind.
